data story test run 

Example with no hiding code:

```{r}
x <- 1
print(x)
```

Example hiding only the source code: 

<div class="fold s">
```{r}
x <- 2
print(x)
```
</div>

Example hiding only the output of the code: 

<div class="fold o">
```{r}
x <- 3
print(x)
```
</div>

Example hiding the source code and the output: 

<div class="fold s o">
```{r}
x <- 4
print(x)
```
</div>
